task.title: Cleaning Shanks 360 and 180 Before and After
task.shortdesc: Here are a few steps to ensure that Shanks 360 and 180 are clean before and after events so that the people of Shanks will be disturbed.

context.p: Making sure that the rooms are clean shows that the people hosting events are serious and professional. Therefore, events of the like can occur again.

substep.cmd: This includes food crumbs leftover from previous users and cleaning surfaces that could have fingerprint marks on the computers.
The chairs in Shanks can be difficult and are often spread throughout the rooms, so make sure they are kept in an orderly fashion
